original_text: They came down from the hill and they went into the town. Samuel took Saul onto the roof of his house and they talked together.
korean_text: 그들이 산당에서 내려 성읍에 들어가서는 사무엘이 사울과 함께 지붕에서 담화하고

sentences.original_text: They came down from the hill
and they went into the town
Samuel took Saul onto the roof of his house
sentences.korean_translation: 사무엘이 사울을 자기 집 지붕으로 데려갔습니다
